Library Management System

Library Management System (.NET)

A modern desktop application built in C# and WPF during the Internship 2025 program.

ðŸ§  Final Thoughts

This project is a great reference for structured .NET applications, and it was very fun to create.
While it might be simple, it demonstrates clean architecture, practical WPF use, and custom feature integration.
